overflow: -moz-scrollbars-none; } .no-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; } About Us: Discover The Diamond Haven Experience Welcome to The Diamond Haven, where luxury, excitement, and sophistication converge to create an unparalleled experience. Nestled in the heart of India, The Diamond Haven stands as a beacon of opulence and hospitality, offering a world-class casino, luxurious accommodations, exquisite dining options, and top-notch entertainment. At The Diamond Haven, our commitment to excellence is evident in every detail. From the moment you arrive, our dedicated staff strives to ensure your stay exceeds expectations. Whether you're here to indulge in high-stakes gaming, relax in our serene spa, or enjoy a gourmet meal crafted by our award-winning chefs, every aspect of The Diamond Haven is designed with your comfort and enjoyment in mind. Beyond our lavish amenities, The Diamond Haven prides itself on its warm hospitality and personalized service. We aim to create memorable experiences for each guest, whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply seeking a luxurious retreat from everyday life. Join us at The Diamond Haven and immerse yourself in a world where elegance meets excitement, and every moment is infused with luxury and possibility. Experience the epitome of hospitality and entertainment at The Diamond Haven, where every visit promises an unforgettable journey. * { text-wrap: balance; } /* Focus state style for keyboard navigation for the focusable elements */ *[tabindex]:focus-visible, input[type="file"]:focus-visible { outline: 0.125rem solid #4d65ff; outline-offset: 0.125rem; } /* Get rid of top margin on first element in any rich text element */ .w-richtext > :not(div):first-child, .w-richtext > div:first-child > :first-child { margin-top: 0 !important; } /* Get rid of bottom margin on last element in any rich text element */ .w-richtext > :last-child, .w-richtext ol li:last-child, .w-richtext ul li:last-child { margin-bottom: 0 !important; } /* Prevent all click and hover interaction with an element */ .pointer-events-off { pointer-events: none; } /* Enables all click and hover interaction with an element */ .pointer-events-on { pointer-events: auto; } /* Create a class of .div-square which maintains a 1:1 dimension of a div */ .div-square::after { content: ""; display: block; padding-bottom: 100%; } /* Make sure containers never lose their center alignment */ .container-medium, .container-small, .container-large { margin-right: auto !important; margin-left: auto !important; } /* Make the following elements inherit typography styles from the parent and not have hardcoded values. overflow: -moz-scrollbars-none; } .no-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; } Our Unique Rooms: A World of Luxury and Comfort Experience unparalleled luxury and comfort in our unique rooms at The Diamond Haven. Each room is meticulously designed to offer a distinct and memorable stay, ensuring that every guest finds their perfect retreat within our luxurious sanctuary. Diamond Suite Indulge in unparalleled luxury in our Diamond Suite, where opulence meets sophistication. Featuring spacious living areas, stunning views, and personalized service, the Diamond Suite offers a truly extraordinary experience. Royal Villa Experience regal living in our Royal Villa, complete with lavish furnishings, private gardens, and exclusive amenities. Perfect for discerning guests seeking privacy and luxury. Penthouse Paradise Elevate your stay in our Penthouse Paradise, boasting panoramic views, modern design, and luxurious amenities. Ideal for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Executive Retreat Find serenity and style in our Executive Retreat, featuring refined decor, premium comforts, and dedicated workspace. Perfect for business travelers or guests seeking a tranquil escape. Family Oasis Enjoy family time in our Family Oasis, a spacious haven with interconnected rooms, kid-friendly amenities, and personalized services. Ideal for creating lasting memories with loved ones. Honeymoon Haven Celebrate romance in our Honeymoon Haven, where intimate settings, luxurious baths, and breathtaking views create the perfect ambiance for newlyweds. Artist's Studio Unleash creativity in our Artist's Studio, a unique space inspired by art and design, featuring curated decor, inspiring views, and ample workspace for artistic endeavors. Coming Soon Wellness Suite Rejuvenate mind and body in our Wellness Suite, offering holistic amenities, tranquil surroundings, and personalized wellness programs designed to enhance your well-being. Our Advantage Over Others: Setting New Standards in Luxury Hospitality In the competitive landscape of luxury hospitality, The Diamond Haven stands out with unparalleled advantages that redefine the guest experience. From our exquisite accommodations to our world-class amenities and personalized service, we are committed to setting new standards of excellence. Sky Lounge Serenity Enjoy breathtaking views and exclusive access to our Sky Lounge, where luxury meets tranquility high above the city. Indulge in handcrafted cocktails, gourmet bites, and impeccable service in a sophisticated atmosphere that elevates every moment. Concierge Excellence Experience personalized service like never before with our dedicated concierge team. From arranging private tours and restaurant reservations to coordinating special celebrations, our concierge service ensures your every request is met with efficiency and care. VIP Casino Privileges Unlock VIP status at our world-class casino with exclusive privileges, including private gaming lounges, personalized hosts, and access to high-stakes tables. Enjoy the thrill of gaming in a setting tailored for discerning players. Spa Sanctuary Rejuvenate mind, body, and soul at our luxurious spa sanctuary. Experience holistic wellness with a range of rejuvenating treatments, from massages to facials, in serene surroundings designed to enhance relaxation and well-being. Culinary Delights Embark on a culinary journey with our diverse dining options, featuring gourmet cuisine from around the world. Whether you crave fine dining elegance, casual bites, or innovative cocktails, our restaurants and bars promise a feast for the senses. have questions? Experience these unique features and more at The Diamond Haven, where every detail is crafted to ensure an unforgettable stay filled with luxury, comfort, and exceptional service. Get in touch "My recent stay at The Diamond Haven was absolutely phenomenal. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism by the staff. The check-in process was seamless, and I was quickly escorted to my room, which was beautifully appointed with modern decor and luxurious amenities." Emily Thompson Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer 18+ © 2024 The Diamond Haven. All rights reserved.

overflow: -moz-scrollbars-none; } .no-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; } Welcome to The Diamond Haven Casino: Your Premier Destination for Thrilling Gaming and Unmatched Excitement Step into a world of glamour and exhilaration at The Diamond Haven Casino, where the thrill of gaming meets the elegance of luxury. Our state-of-the-art casino floor offers a vast array of gaming options designed to cater to both novice and seasoned players alike. From the excitement of classic table games such as blackjack, poker, and roulette to the latest in slot machine technology, every visit promises endless opportunities for fun and fortune. Blackjack Bonanza Experience the Classic Card Game Like Never Before Step up to our elegant blackjack tables and immerse yourself in the timeless allure of this classic card game. At The Diamond Haven Casino, our Blackjack Bonanza offers an exciting twist on traditional blackjack, with multiple variations and side bets to keep you on the edge of your seat. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a newcomer to the game, our professional dealers are here to guide you through each hand, ensuring a thrilling and rewarding experience. Test your strategy and luck, and aim for that perfect 21! More details Royal Roulette Spin the Wheel and Feel the Rush of Royalty Discover the elegance and excitement of Royal Roulette at The Diamond Haven Casino. Our beautifully designed roulette tables provide an immersive gaming experience, complete with expert croupiers and a luxurious setting. Place your bets on your favorite numbers, colors, or combinations, and feel the anticipation build as the wheel spins. Will luck be on your side? Experience the sophisticated thrill of roulette, where every spin brings the promise of big wins and unforgettable moments. More details Poker Palace Join the Ultimate Poker Showdown Welcome to Poker Palace, the heart of high-stakes poker action at The Diamond Haven Casino. Our poker room offers a variety of games, including Texas Hold'em, Omaha, and Seven-Card Stud, catering to both casual players and serious competitors. Engage in intense poker showdowns with fellow enthusiasts, sharpen your skills, and compete for impressive pots. With regular tournaments and cash games, Poker Palace is the ultimate destination for those seeking the perfect blend of strategy, skill, and excitement. More details Slot Machine Spectacular Unleash the Fun with the Latest and Greatest Slots Embark on a thrilling adventure with our Slot Machine Spectacular, featuring a vast selection of the latest and most popular slot machines. From classic fruit slots to cutting-edge video slots with stunning graphics and immersive themes, there's something for every slot enthusiast. Enjoy the excitement of bonus rounds, free spins, and progressive jackpots that can turn a single spin into a life-changing win. With a variety of denominations and endless themes, our slot machines offer endless fun and potential rewards. More details Experience the Ultimate in Luxury and Excitement Join The Diamond Haven family and elevate your stay with unparalleled perks and personalized services. As a member, you'll receive priority reservations, complimentary upgrades, and invitations to exclusive events. Enjoy the best that our casino and hotel have to offer with membership benefits tailored to your preferences. Sign up today and immerse yourself in the ultimate luxury experience. 18+ Warning Welcome to The Diamond Haven, an exclusive destination for guests aged 18 and above. Our facilities, including our casino and certain entertainment areas, are reserved for adults only. Please ensure you meet the legal age requirement before accessing these areas. We prioritize responsible gaming and encourage guests to enjoy our amenities responsibly. Thank you for your understanding and compliance. Continue Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer 18+ © 2024 The Diamond Haven. All rights reserved.

pages.index: Welcome to The Diamond Haven - Luxury Hotel & Casino The Diamond Haven Home About us Casino Сontact * { text-wrap: balance; } /* Focus state style for keyboard navigation for the focusable elements */ *[tabindex]:focus-visible, input[type="file"]:focus-visible { outline: 0.125rem solid #4d65ff; outline-offset: 0.125rem; } /* Get rid of top margin on first element in any rich text element */ .w-richtext > :not(div):first-child, .w-richtext > div:first-child > :first-child { margin-top: 0 !important; } /* Get rid of bottom margin on last element in any rich text element */ .w-richtext > :last-child, .w-richtext ol li:last-child, .w-richtext ul li:last-child { margin-bottom: 0 !important; } /* Prevent all click and hover interaction with an element */ .pointer-events-off { pointer-events: none; } /* Enables all click and hover interaction with an element */ .pointer-events-on { pointer-events: auto; } /* Create a class of .div-square which maintains a 1:1 dimension of a div */ .div-square::after { content: ""; display: block; padding-bottom: 100%; } /* Make sure containers never lose their center alignment */ .container-medium, .container-small, .container-large { margin-right: auto !important; margin-left: auto !important; } /* Make the following elements inherit typography styles from the parent and not have hardcoded values. Important: You will not be able to style for example "All Links" in Designer with this CSS applied. Uncomment this CSS to use it in the project. Leave this message for future hand-off. */ /* a, .w-input, .w-select, .w-tab-link, .w-nav-link, .w-dropdown-btn, .w-dropdown-toggle, .w-dropdown-link { color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; font-size: inherit; } */ /* Apply "..." after 3 lines of text */ .text-style-3lines { display: -webkit-box; overflow: hidden; -webkit-line-clamp: 3; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; } /* Apply "..." after 2 lines of text */ .text-style-2lines { display: -webkit-box; overflow: hidden; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; } /* Adds inline flex display */ .display-inlineflex { display: inline-flex; } /* These classes are never overwritten */ .hide { display: none !important; } @media screen and (max-width: 991px) { .hide, .hide-tablet { display: none !important; } } @media screen and (max-width: 767px) { .hide-mobile-landscape { display: none !important; } } @media screen and (max-width: 479px) { .hide-mobile { display: none !important; } } .margin-0 { margin: 0rem !important; } .padding-0 { padding: 0rem !important; } .spacing-clean { padding: 0rem !important; margin: 0rem !important; } .margin-top { margin-right: 0rem !important; margin-bottom: 0rem !important; margin-left: 0rem !important; } .padding-top { padding-right: 0rem !important; padding-bottom: 0rem !important; padding-left: 0rem !important; } .margin-right { margin-top: 0rem !important; margin-bottom: 0rem !important; margin-left: 0rem !important; } .padding-right { padding-top: 0rem !important; padding-bottom: 0rem !important; padding-left: 0rem !important; } .margin-bottom { margin-top: 0rem !important; margin-right: 0rem !important; margin-left: 0rem !important; } .padding-bottom { padding-top: 0rem !important; padding-right: 0rem !important; padding-left: 0rem !important; } .margin-left { margin-top: 0rem !important; margin-right: 0rem !important; margin-bottom: 0rem !important; } .padding-left { padding-top: 0rem !important; padding-right: 0rem !important; padding-bottom: 0rem !important; } .margin-horizontal { margin-top: 0rem !important; margin-bottom: 0rem !important; } .padding-horizontal { padding-top: 0rem !important; padding-bottom: 0rem !important; } .margin-vertical { margin-right: 0rem !important; margin-left: 0rem !important; } .padding-vertical { padding-right: 0rem !important; padding-left: 0rem !important; } /* Apply "..." at 100% width */ .truncate-width { width: 100%; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; } /* Removes native scrollbar */ .no-scrollbar { -ms-overflow-style: none; overflow: -moz-scrollbars-none; } .no-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; } Welcome to The Diamond Haven: Where Luxury Meets Excitement in the Heart of India Welcome to The Diamond Haven, your ultimate destination for luxury, excitement, and entertainment. Nestled in the heart of India, our premier casino and hotel offer an unparalleled experience for those seeking the perfect blend of opulence and thrill. From world-class gaming and exquisite dining to lavish accommodations and top-notch entertainment, The Diamond Haven promises an unforgettable stay. Discover a world where elegance meets excitement, and every moment sparkles with possibilities. Join us at The Diamond Haven and indulge in a getaway like no other. A work of art Luxurious Accommodations Experience the epitome of luxury in our elegantly designed rooms and suites. Each accommodation at The Diamond Haven is meticulously crafted to offer comfort, style, and tranquility. Enjoy breathtaking views, plush furnishings, and state-of-the-art amenities that ensure a restful and rejuvenating stay. Whether you’re here for a weekend escape or an extended vacation, our accommodations provide the perfect retreat. More details "My stay at The Diamond Haven was absolutely unforgettable. The luxurious rooms, impeccable service, and top-notch amenities exceeded all my expectations. I particularly enjoyed the exquisite dining options and the vibrant casino floor. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a high-end getaway!" Sarah Johnson Great service Exquisite Dining Savor the flavors of excellence at our diverse dining venues. The Diamond Haven offers a culinary journey that caters to every palate, from gourmet fine dining to casual bites. Our expert chefs use the finest ingredients to create mouthwatering dishes that delight the senses. Enjoy a romantic dinner, a celebratory feast, or a quick snack in a setting that combines elegance with comfort. Every meal at The Diamond Haven is an unforgettable experience. More details Entertainment for all tastes Top-Notch Entertainment Immerse yourself in world-class entertainment at The Diamond Haven. Our resort hosts a variety of spectacular shows, live performances, and events that cater to all tastes. From captivating concerts and theatrical productions to lively nightlife and themed parties, there’s always something happening at The Diamond Haven. Join us for an evening of entertainment that will leave you mesmerized and craving for more. More details Spa & Wellness Retreat Revitalize and Rejuvenate Indulge in the ultimate relaxation experience at The Diamond Haven’s Spa & Wellness Retreat. Our serene sanctuary offers a range of luxurious treatments and therapies designed to refresh your body and mind. From soothing massages and revitalizing facials to holistic wellness programs and state-of-the-art fitness facilities, our expert therapists and trainers are dedicated to your well-being. Unwind in our tranquil spa environment and emerge feeling renewed and invigorated. The Diamond Haven’s Spa & Wellness Retreat is your haven of peace amidst the excitement. More details Unlock Exclusive Benefits Today Become a member of The Diamond Haven and enjoy a world of exclusive privileges and rewards. From special discounts on accommodations and dining to VIP access to our gaming floor and entertainment events, our membership program is designed to enhance your experience. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to be part of our elite community. Sign up now and start enjoying the luxurious benefits that await you. Cookie Notice At The Diamond Haven, we use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized content. By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies as described in our Cookie Policy. Adjust your settings or learn more about how we use cookies by visiting our Privacy Policy page. Accept Cancel Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer 18+ © 2024 The Diamond Haven. All rights reserved.
pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy of The Diamond Haven - Your Privacy Matters to Us The Diamond Haven Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy Policy The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services to you. We may use your personal information to process reservations, communicate with you, respond to your inquiries, and provide customer support. Non-personal information may be used for analytical purposes, such as analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking user movements, and gathering demographic information. We may also use your information to send you promotional emails or newsletters, but you have the option to opt out of receiving such communications. Your information will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company for any reason without your consent, except as necessary to fulfill a request or transaction. Our website and services are not directed to children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18 without verifiable parental consent. If we discover that a child under 18 has provided us with personal information without parental consent, we will promptly delete such information from our systems. Parents or guardians who believe that their child has provided us with personal information without their consent should contact us immediately. We reserve the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time without prior notice. Any changes to this policy will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this privacy policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. Your continued use of our website or services after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of those changes. If you do not agree with any aspect of the updated privacy policy, you must immediately cease using our website and services. You have the option to opt out of receiving promotional communications from us. If you no longer wish to receive promotional emails or newsletters, you can unsubscribe by following the instructions provided in the email or by contacting us directly. Even if you opt out of receiving promotional communications, we may still send you non-promotional messages related to your transactions or account. Please allow up to 10 business days for us to process your opt-out request. Opting out of promotional communications does not opt you out of necessary communications, such as those regarding your reservations or account. We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. If you wish to request the deletion of your personal information, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy. Even if we delete your personal information, it may still be stored in backup copies for a limited period of time due to technical constraints. We may also retain certain information for record-keeping purposes, to resolve disputes, enforce our agreements, or comply with legal obligations. Your personal information will be securely disposed of when it is no longer needed for these purposes. We may share your personal information with third parties who provide services on our behalf, such as payment processors, IT service providers, and marketing agencies. These third parties are contractually obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes specified by us. We may also disclose your information to comply with legal obligations, enforce our policies, respond to legal claims, or protect the rights, property, or safety of our guests, employees, or others. In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your personal information may be transferred as part of the transaction. We will notify you via email or prominent notice on our website if your information is transferred to a new entity under a different privacy policy. You have the right to access, update, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. You can manage your communication preferences by opting out of marketing emails or newsletters through the unsubscribe link provided in the email. If you wish to exercise your rights or have any questions about our privacy practices, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy. We will respond to your requests within a reasonable timeframe and in accordance with applicable laws. Please note that we may need to verify your identity before processing certain requests. Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children without parental consent. If we discover that we have inadvertently gathered personal information from a child, we will promptly delete it from our records. Parents or guardians who believe that we may have collected personal information from a child should contact us immediately. TheDiamondHaven@gmail.com. Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, where data protection laws may differ. We implement safeguards such as standard contractual clauses or rely on other legal mechanisms to ensure that your information is protected when transferred internationally. By using our services or providing us with your information, you consent to the transfer of your information to countries outside of your own. If you have any questions about international transfers or would like further information about the safeguards we have in place, please contact us. We may update this privacy policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or industry standards. We will notify you of any material changes to this policy by posting the updated version on our website and indicating the date of the last revision. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. Continued use of our website or services after the effective date of the revised policy constitutes your acceptance of the changes. If you do not agree with any aspect of the updated policy, you may discontinue use of our website and services. Our website uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized content and advertisements. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. We use cookies to remember your preferences, analyze site traffic, and track your interactions with our website. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or by opting out of certain types of cookies using our cookie consent tool. Please note that disabling cookies may affect your experience on our website and limit certain features. Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not operated or controlled by us. This privacy policy applies solely to information collected by our website and services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of third-party websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of these third parties before providing them with your personal information. We do not endorse or assume any responsibility for the third-party websites linked to our website. We do not collect or store sensitive information such as racial or ethnic origin, political opinions, religious beliefs, or health information unless required for legal or regulatory purposes. If you voluntarily provide us with sensitive information, we will handle it with the utmost confidentiality and in accordance with applicable laws. Sensitive information will only be used for the specific purposes for which it was provided and with your explicit consent. We implement strict controls and access restrictions to protect sensitive information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer 18+ © 2024 The Diamond Haven. All rights reserved.
